snippet: Attorney General Bob Ferguson, in an opinion on Thursday, said cities and counties can block licensed marijuana businesses from operating.
abstract: Washington State Atty Gen Bob Ferguson offers opinion that cities and counties can block licensed marijuana businesses from operating.
lead_paragraph: Attorney General Bob Ferguson, in an opinion on Thursday, said cities and counties can block licensed marijuana businesses from operating.

headline.main: Washington: Cities Can Block Marijuana Operations
headline.print_headline: Washington: Cities Can Block Marijuana Operations
